lead_paragraph: A jury heard evidence that Redinel Dervishaj extorted money from restaurant and nightclub owners with the help of a corrupt New York police officer.

headline.print_headline: Man Is Convicted in Astoria Racket
headline.main: Queens Man Convicted in Astoria Protection Racket

snippet: A jury heard evidence that Redinel Dervishaj extorted money from restaurant and nightclub owners with the help of a corrupt New York police officer.
abstract: Queens man Redinel Dervishaj is convicted of extorting thousands of dollars from three small businesses in Astoria in protection racket he ran with help of New York City police officer.
